messages.title: On 7 May you can cause an earthquake
messages.content: that will build the homes Hackney needs.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plan to build 12,000 social homes for rent over ten years. Positioning local people not developers at the heart of planning.
Promises the fully costed £8bn a year the NHS needs.
Ensure a fair start for every child with the Pupil Premium.
Would give ordinary taxpayers a £1,200 tax cut.
Supports the creation of separated cycle & pedestrian routes in Hackney.

issues.economy: Would give ordinary taxpayers a £1,200 tax cut.
issues.education: Ensure a fair start for every child with the Pupil Premium.
issues.environment: Supports the creation of separated cycle & pedestrian routes in Hackney.
issues.health: Promises the fully costed £8bn a year the NHS needs.

housing.content: Plan to build 12,000 social homes for rent over ten years. Positioning local people not developers at the heart of planning.

leaflet.personalStatement: Simon has lived in Hackney North and Stoke Newington for 20 years.

politicalExperience.role: Chair of Governors at Shacklewell primary school
Member of the Executive Committee of L.E.A.D.
politicalExperience.achievements: a not for profit organisation that helps school improvement by coaching and mentoring
